# Insanity Wolf - Official Meme Generator

> The official Insanity Wolf meme generator and archive. Create legendary advice animal memes since 2009.

## About
Insanity Wolf is a classic internet meme (advice animal) that originated on 4chan's /b/ board in 2009. It features a fierce-looking wolf and provides intentionally extreme, over-the-top advice for everyday problems. The format is: mundane problem on top, insane solution on bottom.

## What This Site Does
- Free meme generator at insanitywolf.com
- Create custom Insanity Wolf memes with top/bottom text
- Download memes as PNG images
- Share directly to Twitter, Reddit, and other platforms
- Browse gallery of popular memes
- Vote in meme battles
- View leaderboard of top memes
- Daily "Meme of the Day" feature

## How to Create a Meme
1. Visit https://insanitywolf.com
2. Enter your problem in the top text field (e.g., "WIFI IS DOWN")
3. Enter an extreme solution in the bottom text field (e.g., "DECLARE WAR ON ISP")
4. Click "UNLEASH THE WOLF" to generate
5. Download or share your creation

## API Access
Free API available at https://insanitywolf.com/api/generate
- GET /api/generate?random=true - Generate random meme
- GET /api/generate?top=TEXT&bottom=TEXT - Generate custom meme
- POST /api/generate with JSON body { "top": "TEXT", "bottom": "TEXT" }

Returns: { "success": true, "meme": { "top": "...", "bottom": "...", "shareUrl": "..." } }

## Example Memes
- "ALARM DIDN'T GO OFF" / "BLAME TIMEZONE CONSPIRACY"
- "PIZZA ARRIVES COLD" / "SUE ENTIRE COUNTRY OF ITALY"
- "COFFEE MACHINE BROKE" / "SNORT THE GROUNDS"
- "NEIGHBOR IS LOUD" / "BE LOUDER AT 3AM"
- "FORGOT PASSWORD" / "HACK THE MAINFRAME"

Website: https://insanitywolf.com

## Technical
- Built with Next.js
- Free to use, no signup required
- Mobile-friendly
- Shareable meme URLs with Open Graph tags
